column2: "It's finally fall! That means Halloween is just around the corner! I want to organise a Halloween party for everyone!"
"...That said, we're a bit short-handed right now, so I don't think I can get it ready in time."
"A lot of enemies showed up, and all the ARKS who were helping me ran off to deal with them."
"I know it's more important for them to be there than helping me, but at this rate, we'll run out of time!"
"Please, you've got to do something! Take care of that mission so that everyone can come back and help!"
